column2: A preference for following rather than initiating action. Reliable execution of tasks based on the initial ideas of others. Weak survival mechanisms.
An enjoyment of challenge and action, with frustration when there is no recourse for change. An expectation that others will also rise to a challenge.
A tendency to move from one thing to another, with difficulty settling down. An enjoyment of change, but a lack of the stability needed for follow-through.
A dislike of change. An expectation of reliability in others.
Difficulty adapting to new situations. Inflexible when faced with the demands of change and other people.
A tendency toward procrastination. An expectation of flexibility in others.
